bmps.title: Kickoff → Caarya
bmps.subtitle: Onboarding new members
bmps.description: New members are most confused on Day 1. If you don't standardize onboarding, leads waste time repeating basics, newcomers start late, and enthusiasm dies. A consistent welcome + first mini-task converts interest → contribution fast.

bmps.title: Chaos → Calendar
bmps.subtitle: Calendar + comms rhythm
bmps.description: People fail not from lack of will, but from collisions and forgetting. A shared calendar reduces last-minute chaos and normalizes rituals (check-ins, updates)

bmps.title: Inbox → Impact
bmps.subtitle: ask tracker + daily/weekly updates
bmps.description: Work gets lost in chats. A public tracker makes status visible, prevents duplicates, and creates a body of evidence for HQ.

bmps.title: Talent Tuning
bmps.subtitle: Roster fit
bmps.description: Mismatched roles = slow progress + frustration. Adjust reality to strengths.

bmps.title: Docs → Done
bmps.subtitle: Master checklists & SOP vault
bmps.description: Under pressure, memory fails. Checklists make readiness objective and repeatable

bmps.title: Raw → Report
bmps.subtitle: Weekly reporting
bmps.description: "If it isn't written, it didn't happen." Reports make your value auditable and shareable (internally and for future references

bmps.title: Talent Tuning
bmps.subtitle: Roster fit
bmps.description: Mismatched roles = slow progress + frustration. Adjust reality to strengths.

bmps.title: Docs → Done
bmps.subtitle: Master checklists & SOP vault
bmps.description: Under pressure, memory fails. Checklists make readiness objective and repeatable

items.title: Daily Stand-Up
items.subtitle: #Success Recognition and Support
items.description: Regular inclusive meetings where every team member is encouraged to contribute and share their views.

items.title: Weekly Retro
items.subtitle: #Peer Recognition and Support
items.description: Weekly meetings that focus on discussing the transparent and open sharing of both positive and negative project developments through the mad, sad, glad framework.

items.title: Accountability Check-ins
items.subtitle: Project Success Updates
items.description: Regularly scheduled meetings to discuss personal contributions and project status.

items.title: Challenge Circles
items.subtitle: Failure Roundtables
items.description: Regular sessions where members meet to discuss ongoing challenges and work together to find solutions.

items.title: Honesty Hours
items.subtitle: Failure Analysis Collaborationt
items.description: Designated times when teams can discuss project failures and personal errors in a supportive environment

items.title: Expert Hours
items.subtitle: Failure Support and Guidance
items.description: Dedicated times when admin or other experts are available to share their knowledge and answer questions in a one-on-one setting.

items.title: Expert Exchange
items.subtitle: Failure Reporting
items.description: Regularly scheduled sessions where experts from various fields share their knowledge with project teams.

items.title: Empowerment Workshops
items.subtitle: Failure Analysis Collaboration
items.description: Workshops that focus on building specific skills relevant to the project's needs, led by industry experts.

items.title: Collaborative Problem-Solving Sessions
items.subtitle: Failure Reporting
items.description: Workshops where team members come together to brainstorm solutions.

items.title: Quick Fix Hours
items.subtitle: Failure Reporting
items.description: Dedicated times when teams focus solely on resolving reported issues.

items.title: Rapid Response Teams
items.subtitle: Failure Lessons and Assistance
items.description: Dedicated teams or individuals ready to provide immediate assistance whenever needed.

items.title: Motivation Mondays
items.subtitle: Peer Recognition and Support
items.description: Weekly messages or meetings that provide motivational insights and stories to start the week strongly.

items.title: Unity Gatherings
items.subtitle: Success Recognition and Support
items.description: Regular community events or gatherings that celebrate togetherness and shared goals.

items.title: Startup Discovery
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A curated startup immersion experience through shadowing, demos, and founder walkthroughs.

items.title: Talent Discovery
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: A pipeline to pre-vetted student talent matched on both skills and culture.

items.title: Talent Curation & Placement
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: Skill-shaping and onboarding of student recruits before placement.

items.title: Talent Stewardship
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: Ongoing performance tracking and upskilling of placed student talent.

items.title: Talent Engagement (Founder Dialogues)
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: Candid sessions with founders and experts sharing startup stories and real-life lessons.

items.title: Career Direction
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A guided self-discovery process to explore personal and career interests.

items.title: Career Stage Mapping
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A five-step framework that visualizes one's career development journey.

items.title: Caarya Life
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A unified platform for personal development, collaboration, and paid opportunities.

items.title: Tech Mentorship
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: An on-demand expert network for technical guidance and project help.

items.title: Learning Ledger
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A system that automatically logs student tasks, reflections, outputs, and feedback across their pod journey.

items.title: Dynamic Portfolio
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A living showcase of student work, competencies, and endorsements.

items.title: Knowledge Vault
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A centralized, version-controlled repository of best practices, case decks, and curated tools.

items.title: Founder Dialogue Spotlight
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: Live or recorded conversations with startup founders.

items.title: Peer Synergy
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: Structured peer-to-peer teaming for cross-disciplinary micro-projects.

items.title: Creator Pool
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: An on-demand crew of student content creators available for gigs.

items.title: Event Orchestration
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: Planning and execution of hackathons, challenges, and campus events.

items.title: EVP Spotlight
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: Curated campus roadshows showcasing startup mission and culture

items.title: Creator Pool
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: On-demand student content creators for media and campaign needs.

items.title: Idea Sandbox
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A protected space for students to test and refine early-stage ideas.

items.title: Founder Training
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: Short workshops on core startup topics like GTM, legal, and cap table hygiene.

items.title: Team Training Ground
items.subtitle: Student Side
items.description: A simulated startup environment for student venture teams.

items.title: Innovation Sprints
items.subtitle: Startup Side
items.description: Facilitated brainstorming and ideation sessions with student squads.
